title: You are guilty, Yellow
author: VD
content_html:
The lying little Hmong murderer gets locked up for good:

A jury convicted an Asian immigrant of first-degree murder in the shooting deaths of six deer hunters, rejecting his claims that he fired in self-defense after being shot at and taunted by racial slurs. Chai Soua Vang, an ethnic Hmong who came to this country from Southeast Asia more than 20 years ago, faces mandatory life in prison. Wisconsin does not have a death penalty.

Jurors deliberated about three hours before convicting Vang on six counts of first-degree intentional homicide and three counts of attempted homicide. In addition to the six dead, two hunters were wounded in the shootings Nov. 21 that began when the group of hunters confronted Vang for being on private land….

The slayings occurred during the state’s beloved deer hunting season and exposed racial tension between the predominantly white north woods residents and immigrants from the Hmong ethnic group. Outside court, Vang’s sister questioned the jury’s makeup.

“Everyone was white,” Chou Vang said. “They do not understand. They will never understand what my brother went through out there,” she said. “He was not a dog to sit there and let them shoot at him. He was proud of who he is.”

Here’s an idea, Vang. If you don’t want to get tried by white people, THEN DON’T KILL PEOPLE IN WISCONSIN! Go back to Hmong-chee-chee land and kill yellow people, then you can have an all-yellow jury. Won’t that be nice? Maybe they’ll care about your ethnic pride and understanding why your cretinous brother thinks it’s okay to trespass on private property and murder people because he doesn’t like how they talk to him.

Of course, the reason this loser family is here in the Midwest in the first place is because of yellow people killing yellow people. They were our allies in Vietnam, that’s great. But so was Stalin and we didn’t give him a farm in New Ulm, Minnesota.

This multi-cultural disaster has to end. Simply bringing people to America, or Holland or the UK doesn’t change how thousands of years of culture and tradition have shaped them and their families. Forget indoctrination attempts, if they don’t want do exactly as the Romans do, they don’t belong in Rome.
